page.title: 05ARTS & CRAFTS: MKT WESTON
page.content: As in most rural areas many people follow varied crafts. Some even making their chosen craft their full time employment.A lady in Market Weston has devoted her talent for embroidery inspired by medieval work, by producing pictures in exceptionally fine pure silk, accepting commissions which go to all parts of the world, including items representing the raised medieval battle ship of King Henry VIII, the 'Mary Rose'. Another talented lady nearby, attends Crafts Fairs and fetes display- ing & selling her beautiful dried and silk flower arrangements,she also sells direct to shops. Crochet, patchwork, watercolours, oil painting,hand knit- ting & calligraphy are all produced and given help and encouragment by the Market Weston and District Women's Institute.
